error.dbFileNotSet: Please set the database file location.
error.directoryNotSet: Please set the photo file location.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred while opening the database file.

scanFinishedWithNoPhoto.heading: No photos found
scanFinishedWithNoPhoto.description: Please check the photo directory settings.

notConfigured.heading: Not configured
notConfigured.description: Please set the database file location in the settings menu.

db.heading: Database
db.description: Set the location for your VRChatActivityTools database file (e.g., VRChatActivityLog.db).

photoFolders.heading: Photo Folders
photoFolders.description: Set the folder that contains the photos to be scanned.

language.heading: Language
language.description: Select your preferred language for the application interface from the list.

settingFile.heading: Settings File
settingFile.description: Open and edit the application's configuration file (in JSON format).

thumbnailCache.heading: Thumbnail Cache
thumbnailCache.description: Access this folder to manage thumbnail cache files. Deleting this folder will prompt the app to regenerate thumbnails for all images.

license.heading: License
license.description: This application incorporates open-source software. Details can be found here.

apply.scanningMessage: The scanning of the photo is in progress. Settings can be applied after completion.
apply.successMessage: Success to load database and scan photo.
apply.errorMessage: Failed to load database or scan photo.
